Trade/Device Name(s): ELVIS HSV ID and D3 Typing Test System
ELVIS HSV D and D3 Typing Test System
Specimen Container(s): Multi-well plates with or without coverslips
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): ELVIS HSV Cells (genetically engineered Baby Hamster Kidney cells)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for ELVIS HSV ID and D3 Typing Test System for culture and typing of HSV-1 and HSV-2 from cutaneous and mucocutaneous specimens using cell-based culture and fluorescent antibody detection.
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative identification and typing of HSV-1 and HSV-2 from cutaneous or mucocutaneous specimens in patients suspected of HSV infection; not established for antiviral therapy, prenatal monitoring, or CSF specimens.
